## Source: ossf-package-analysis (120043d6321e2fed720fec55472b0ab43942a27d5accbd7d2ab9799b15c5f5d6)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'nerst' @ 99.7 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
